# [Interview #1107: WOR-University Bookstore, Entry #19](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1107#19)

#### AhoyMatey

Why does Urithiru not have hallowed stones?

#### Brandon Sanderson

That'll be answered eventually. It's cultural, not magical.
